name: 13-forever-divtober-2022
title: 13. Forever - Divtober 2022
description: This entry for #divtober was the most challenging in terms of time-sunk since the day 2 sunset. The track and car came remarkably quickly, but the animating of the car around the track became a complex math problem I couldn't figure out how to solve elegantly.  I know there must be a smoother approach and welcome feedback on how to refactor this to be less bumpy.
js: /* This entry  for #divtober was the most challenging in terms of time-sunk since the day 2 sunset. The track and car came remarkably quickly, but the animating of the car around the track became a complex math problem I couldn't figure out how to solve elegantly.  I know there must be a smoother approach and welcome feedback on how to refactor this to be less bumpy. There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/j2_0uhsJpEY */
